```{r}
burn <- read.table("~/GitHub/Lifetime_Data_Analysis_project/Burn.txt", quote="\"", comment.char="")
  
colnames(burn) = c("Treatment", "Gender", "Total percentage of burns", "Head indicator", "Buttocks indicator", "Torso indicator", "Upper leg indicator", "Lower leg indicator", "Respiratory system indicator", "Type of burn", "Time to staphylococcus infection", "Infection indicator")

burn$Gender = factor( burn$Gender, levels = c(0,1), labels=c("Man", "Woman"))
burn$Treatment = factor( burn$Treatment, levels = c(0,1), labels=c("bathing care", "body cleansing"))
burn$`Type of burn` = factor( burn$`Type of burn`, levels = c(1, 2, 3, 4), labels=c("chemical", "scalding", "electrical", "flame"))
head(burn)
```
